entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
